projects.title: Flower Store
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application handles all adoption processess and allows to store all evidence on adopting animals from animal shelter.

projects.title: Let's Work
projects.description: A platform where you can find Projects, Ideas, and People with the same interest as you.

projects.title: Blog Website
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my College projects. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
